tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InfluencerContentTracking (
    influencer_id INT,
    brand_id INT,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(50),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    post_date DATE,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    reach INT
);

CREATE TABLE BrandInfluencerContent (
    brand_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    platform_id INT,
    reach INT,
    impact INT
);
CREATE TABLE Influencer (influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), followers INT, platform VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE Post (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, influencer_id INT, content TEXT, likes INT, shares INT, comments INT, post_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Brand (brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), industry VARCHAR(100), budget DECIMAL(10,2), campaign_start DATE, campaign_end DATE);

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    post_date DATE,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    reach_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    like_count INT,
    comment_count INT,
    share_count INT
);
